David Dennis (amụrụ na 17 Mee 1960) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Sol na SABC 1 TV series Soul City
Dennis rụkwara ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro TV Charlie Jade, dị ka onye uwe ojii Sew Sew Tukarrs
N'ozuzu, Dennis enweela ọrụ na usoro telivishọn iri na atọ dị iche iche.
O ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri ya, na ihe nkiri egwu.
Dennis apụtala n'ihe nkiri asaa, nke a gụnyere: Red Dust, 10,000 BC na Disgrace

O meriri onye na-akwado onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na South African Film and Television Awards, na 2009, maka ọrụ ya dị ka Jacob, n'ihe nkiri The World Unseen Jonathan Curiel, na nyocha ya nke The World Unseen, maka San Francisco Chronicle, kwuru na: "..
onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa David Dennis..
na-enye ụdị arụmọrụ siri ike, na-adọrọ mmasị, nke dị iche iche nke bụ akara nke ihe nkiri ọ bụla na-adọkpụ".
Dennis na-akụzi ime ihe nkiri na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ nke Tshwane
